items.description: Grants reroll or autopass on a check.

items.name: Reactive Vault Camo Mesh
items.description:
+1 to dodge-based saves
Grants 1 turn of stealth during any encounter
Auto-disengage from non-boss enemies (once per fight)
Installable in full-body or medium armor
